game.description: Find the ancient artifact and retrieve it for the village elder.
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting +10 to intelligence and a chest containing 100 gold pieces

tasks.description: Find the entrance to the lost temple hidden in the nearby forest.
tasks.objective: Locate the entrance to the lost temple.

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous temple maze and find the artifact room.
tasks.location: The Lost Temple of Eldarath (X=123, Y=456)
tasks.objective: Reach the artifact room without triggering any traps.

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian of the artifact and claim it as your own.
tasks.objective: Collect the artifact and prepare for its return to the village.

game.title: The Lost Artifact of Eldarath
